Check all PCH's RTC signals.

message: What is the exact resistance to ground at L7330?

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
That is pure short.
Lift the coil one side and check where the short remains.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: I lifted L7330 the short remains on the 2nd I checked all the leveling capacitors and don't pull down PPDDR_S3_REG at this point is something after the boardview would look like a rhophore under a ram, lifted the ram?

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: CPU is connected there too; and is more sensitive than the RAM chips...

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
So a short on the CPU?
Either first I have to check U7801 or remove R1120 and see if the short is interrupted

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: Being a 3023 it's possible someone tried to reflow the RAM and killed it.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
How do I see the ram that is short?
In fact, I found a missing capacitor near a ram

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
RAM may not be your problem.
In case of short, CPU is the first culprit.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: To confirm that it is the CPU, what should I measure?

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
If you still insist on it, try injecting voltage on the 1V2_S3 power rail; R7350 is probably the easiest point to do it.
Remove CPU heatsink first; however not easy to detect CPU heating, if not pure short...

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: I removed 3 ram modules disappeared the short and the card started I suppose a reflow was done and they shorted pp1v05_S3

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
The sign of previous RAM reflow is easy to detect.
You didn't say anything about that before.
Spending time to change all RAM modules may be wasting time; in case of CPU internal problem.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: I suspected that he had been reflowed at the ram because some capacitors were missing, I began to detach on one side and I was lucky that after 3 modules the short was gone

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message:
You should remove and replace all RAM chips.
You can't know which chip is bad; if the problem is not CPU indeed.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: 3023 is a lost cause anyway, don't waste time.

title: A1369 It doesn't just turn on green light
message: I reballed all the rams, now it works perfectly
